channel.title: CVE Feed for ASUS -- BMC firmware for ASMB9-iKVM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ASUS -- BMC firmware for ASMB9-iKVM

item.title: CVE-2021-28209|2024-09-16T16:58:26.545Z -- asus -- bmc%20firmware%20for%20asmb9-ikvm
item.description: The specific function in ASUS BMC’s firmware Web management page (Delete video file function) does not filter the specific parameter. As obtaining the administrator permission, remote attackers can use the means of path traversal to access system files.

item.title: CVE-2021-28200|2024-09-16T16:48:30.923Z -- asus -- bmc%20firmware%20for%20asmb9-ikvm
item.description: The CD media configuration function in ASUS BMC’s firmware Web management page does not verify the string length entered by users, resulting in a Buffer overflow vulnerability. As obtaining the privileged permission, remote attackers use the leakage to abnormally terminate the Web service.

item.title: CVE-2021-28199|2024-09-16T16:48:36.806Z -- asus -- bmc%20firmware%20for%20asmb9-ikvm
item.description: The specific function in ASUS BMC’s firmware Web management page (Modify user’s information function) does not verify the string length entered by users, resulting in a Buffer overflow vulnerability. As obtaining the privileged permission, remote attackers use the leakage to abnormally terminate the Web service.
